recipe.title: Spicy Oven-Roasted Potatoes
ingredients: 3 russet potatoes (about 1 1/2 pounds), unpeeled, each cut lengthwise into 8 wedges
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Toss potato wedges, oil, paprika, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper on a foil-lined large rimmed baking sheet to evenly coat; season potatoes with salt and pepper.
Roast, turning once, until wedges are golden brown and crisp, 25-30 minutes.
